languages.text: "Страдание очищает. Плоть умерщвляемая закаляет дух, и Футфол восстанет обескровленный, но преображенный".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Argenta: "I pray to the God-Emperor that under Incendia Chorda's rule, Footfall will pass all the trials it must face and emerge purified, resurrected to a new life."

languages.text: "Suffering purifies. Mortification of the flesh hardens the spirit, and Footfall will rise again, exsanguinated but transformed."
languages.original_text: "Страдание очищает. Плоть умерщвляемая закаляет дух, и Футфол восстанет обескровленный, но преображенный".

traits.locale_text: "Suffering purifies. Mortification of the flesh hardens the spirit, and Footfall will rise again, exsanguinated but transformed."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Suffering purifies. Mortification of the flesh hardens the spirit, and Footfall will rise again, exsanguinated but transformed."

languages.text: "Leid säubert. Demütigung des Fleischs stählt den Geist, und Footfall wird sich wieder erheben, ausgeblutet aber verwandelt."
languages.original_text: "Suffering purifies. Mortification of the flesh hardens the spirit, and Footfall will rise again, exsanguinated but transformed."

traits.locale_text: "Leid säubert. Demütigung des Fleischs stählt den Geist, und Footfall wird sich wieder erheben, ausgeblutet aber verwandelt."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « La souffrance est mère de pureté. La mortification de la chair endurcit l'esprit, et Castel renaîtra de ses cendres, exsangue, mais transfigurée. »
languages.original_text: "Suffering purifies. Mortification of the flesh hardens the spirit, and Footfall will rise again, exsanguinated but transformed."

traits.locale_text: « La souffrance est mère de pureté. La mortification de la chair endurcit l'esprit, et Castel renaîtra de ses cendres, exsangue, mais transfigurée. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «El sufrimiento purifica. La mortificación de la carne endurece el espíritu. Paso resurgirá, transformada tras la sangría».
languages.original_text: "Suffering purifies. Mortification of the flesh hardens the spirit, and Footfall will rise again, exsanguinated but transformed."

traits.locale_text: «El sufrimiento purifica. La mortificación de la carne endurece el espíritu. Paso resurgirá, transformada tras la sangría».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「苦しみは浄化します。肉体の死は精神を硬化させ、フットフォールは失血死しながらも変貌して再び蘇るのです」
languages.original_text: "Suffering purifies. Mortification of the flesh hardens the spirit, and Footfall will rise again, exsanguinated but transformed."

traits.locale_text: 「苦しみは浄化します。肉体の死は精神を硬化させ、フットフォールは失血死しながらも変貌して再び蘇るのです」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “苦难会净化灵魂，肉体的痛楚会让精神更加顽强。落脚港必将再次崛起，尽管它被抽干了血，但它会重获新生。”
languages.original_text: "Suffering purifies. Mortification of the flesh hardens the spirit, and Footfall will rise again, exsanguinated but transformed."

traits.locale_text: “苦难会净化灵魂，肉体的痛楚会让精神更加顽强。落脚港必将再次崛起，尽管它被抽干了血，但它会重获新生。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "Suffering purifies. Mortification of the flesh hardens the spirit, and Footfall will rise again, exsanguinated but transformed."
